text: Karin Elisabeth Dreijer Andersson (born 7 April 1975), also known by her stage name Fever Ray, is the lead singer of The Knife. ==Early life== Andersson was born in Nacka, Sweden. She started playing the guitar when she was 10. ==Personal life== Andersson is married to Kent Peter Kristian Andersson and has two children. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish singers Category:Electropop singers
title: Karin Dreijer Andersson
